name: Repugnant Bounty
description:
Rosemarie, an alien princess from the planet Nimola seeks genocide on the evil monsters who killed her mother and people. Can you find and kill all 28 target threats?

Repugnant Bounty is a Metroidvania title heavily inspired by Metroid II, Super Metroid, and Cave Story. Following the game play loop of Metroid II but with the exploration and theming of Super Metroid, many references and Easter Eggs can be found in the game so be on the lookout for them!
